title: FluMist® Begins Shipping for 2010-2011 Influenza Season
description: Vaccine Includes 2009 H1N1 Pandemic Strain; Public Health Officials Encourage Influenza Immunization as Soon as Vaccine Becomes AvailableGAITHERSBURG, Md., July 23 /PRNewswire/ -- MedImmune announced | Vaccine Includes 2009 H1N1 Pandemic Strain; Public Health Officials Encourage Influenza Immunization as Soon as Vaccine Becomes AvailableGAITHERSBURG, Md., July 23 /PRNewswire/ -- MedImmune announced
